00089 class EGS_SPHERES_EXPORT EGS_cSpheres : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00090 
00091 public:
00092 
00093     // construct some CONCENTRIC spheres
00094     EGS_cSpheres(int ns, const EGS_Float *radius, const EGS_Vector &position,
00095                  const string &Name = "");
00096 
00097     // destruct spheres from memory
00098     ~EGS_cSpheres() {
00099         if (nreg) {
00100             delete [] R2;
00101             delete [] R;
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     // method to determine which spheres we are in(between)
00106     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x);
00107 
00108     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x);
00109     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x);
00110 
00111     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00112                               const EGS_Vector &u);
00113     // howfar is particle trajectory from sphere boundry
00114     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00115                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0);
00116 
00117     // hownear - closest perpendicular distance to sphere surface
00118     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x);
00119 
00120     int getMaxStep() const {
00121         return 2*nreg;
00122     };
00123 
00124     const string &getType() const {
00125         return type;
00126     };
00127 
00128     void printInfo() const;
00129 
00130 private:
00131 
00132     EGS_Float *R2;                // radius^2
00133     EGS_Float *R;                 // radius
00134     EGS_Vector xo;                // for conc-spheres, all centres coincide
00135     static string type;
00136 };
